body_content.explanation: the work needed to keep a road, building, machine, etc. in good condition:
examples: Old houses need a lot of maintenance.
There are thorough maintenance checks on each plane before take-off.
The magazine offers tips on cutting your house maintenance costs.

body_content.explanation: money that a person must pay regularly by law in order to support their child or previous marriage partner after a divorce (= official end to a marriage):
examples: He refused to pay maintenance for his three children.

body_content.explanation: a situation in which something continues to exist or is not allowed to become less:
